div.a: The Propaganda Theme Park For Sinicization

div.div: I visited Splendid China, a place that might have been Mao's nationalistic vision of Disneyland. The park's stated mission is to condense "the Chinese history, culture, places of interest, folk arts, and customs" into one easily accessible destination.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y4R7E8&via=Digg&text=The Propaganda Theme Park For Sinicization

div.a: Why Rats Sniff Each Other

div.div: But new research shows that the act of sniffing itself might serve its own social function, allowing rats to reaffirm their hierarchical status and maintain order.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15E372r&via=Digg&text=Why Rats Sniff Each Other

div.div: IT'LL BE MORE THAN RUDE TO POINT

div.a: Your Body As The Key To Your House, Your Car, Your Gun

div.div: With Microchip’s BodyCom technology, the human body is the medium for short-range authentication.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y1leML&via=Digg&text=Your Body As The Key To Your House, Your Car, Your Gun

div.a: Should You Outsource Your Memory To The Internet?

div.div: Technology really is expanding our minds.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/16b4eId&via=Digg&text=Should You Outsource Your Memory To The Internet?

div.a: So Long, Apps: How Hardware Took Over South By Southwest

div.div: Forget CES: Austin is where you show your new gadgets. An old school turn for the tech world's trendiest show.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/16hlITh&via=Digg&text=So Long, Apps: How Hardware Took Over South By Southwest

div.a: EA Apologizes For SimCity Disaster, Offers Free Game To Players

div.div: Electronic Arts’ SimCity was easily the most anticipated game of the season, but its launch was an unmitigated disaster because the DRM solution Electronic Arts and Maxis dreamt up means users have to always be online if they want to play.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zs3MSG&via=Digg&text=EA Apologizes For SimCity Disaster, Offers Free Game To Players

div.a: Is Virtual Reality The 'Holy Grail' Of Gaming?

div.div: Cliff Blezinski, Chris Roberts, Paul Bettner, and Palmer Luckey share their vision for the future of gaming. “Is the Oculus Rift, a virtual reality 3D headset, the future of gaming?” they ask. “Or, is it something bigger — the future of life on planet Earth?”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZrryOK&via=Digg&text=Is Virtual Reality The 'Holy Grail' Of Gaming?

div.a: Elon Musk Just Showed Never-Before-Seen Video Of A Reusable Rocket Launch

div.div: The entrepreneur showed never-before-seen video of a reusable rocket taking off and landing back on its launch pad during the conference.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YTbK38&via=Digg&text=Elon Musk Just Showed Never-Before-Seen Video Of A Reusable Rocket Launch

div.a: What Happens When You Post Revenge Porn?

div.div: It's a truly modern story: Man posts revenge porn of ex-girlfriend, ex-girlfriend then posts revenge porn of man.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10cqNb7&via=Digg&text=What Happens When You Post Revenge Porn?

div.a: Seattle Dive Bar Becomes First To Ban Google Glass

div.div: Owner says "it's because it's kind of a private place that people go." Will other businesses follow?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZyczAk&via=Digg&text=Seattle Dive Bar Becomes First To Ban Google Glass

div.div: WAY BETTER THAN A DASH CAM

div.a: Always Wear A Helmet Cam When You're Falling Down A Mountain

div.div: If you thought mountain climbing was just slightly too scary to ever actually do, prepare to have your opinion reinforced.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WSgHcX&via=Digg&text=Always Wear A Helmet Cam When You're Falling Down A Mountain

div.a: Is The Congo Really The Rape Capital Of The World?

div.div: On rape and truth in Congo.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15s6fhK&via=Digg&text=Is The Congo Really The Rape Capital Of The World?

div.div: NO, YOU CAN'T SEE YOUR CHART

div.a: Majority Of Doctors Opposed To Full Access To Your Own Electronic Records

div.div: With the advent of electronic medical records, you might think doctors and other caregivers would embrace transparency for patients. After all, in the US and most modern counties, you have the right to review your own health records.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WSiY80&via=Digg&text=Majority Of Doctors Opposed To Full Access To Your Own Electronic Records

div.a: Futuristic Levitating Wireless Mouse Prevents Carpal Tunnel

div.div: We may not have hover cars yet but thanks to Prague-basd design studio Kibardindesign, we will soon have a levitating wireless computer mouse known as Bat.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YhoxMO&via=Digg&text=Futuristic Levitating Wireless Mouse Prevents Carpal Tunnel

div.a: The Corpse That Fooled Hitler

div.div: On the morning of April 30, 1943, a fisherman working off the coast of Huelva, Spain found a body floating in the water. The corpse, an adult male, was badly decomposed and wearing a military uniform, trench coat, and boots. Floating nearby, and attached to the man’s trench coat belt with a chain, was a briefcase.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y1WqnK&via=Digg&text=The Corpse That Fooled Hitler

div.a: City-Block-Size Asteroid Comes Out Of Nowhere And Flies By Earth

div.div: An asteroid roughly 64 to 140 meters wide — about the size of a city block — will be zipping past the Earth today, and you can watch a live show of the event from the Slooh Space Camera consortium starting at 12:45 p.m. Pacific/3:45 p.m. Eastern.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WB0sWP&via=Digg&text=City-Block-Size Asteroid Comes Out Of Nowhere And Flies By Earth

div.div: NO REASONABLE OFFERS WILL BE REFUSED

div.a: Want To Own Some Historic Architecture? Buy A Post Office

div.div: Many buildings currently owned by the Postal Service are for sale, or are being considered for sale.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y05gCx&via=Digg&text=Want To Own Some Historic Architecture? Buy A Post Office

div.a: Why The European Plan To Ban Porn Is A Bad Idea

div.div: Early next week, the EU is planning to vote on a resolution calling for a ban on pornography in the name of gender equality. But, good intentions aside, that would actually be a bad move for both Europe’s women and the EU’s commitment to free speech.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YM922t&via=Digg&text=Why The European Plan To Ban Porn Is A Bad Idea

div.a: The Japanese Earthquake: Before And After

div.div: In a few days, Japan will mark the 2nd anniversary of the devastating Tohoku earthquake and resulting tsunami. Here's a series of fantastic before and after images.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13I60AO&via=Digg&text=The Japanese Earthquake: Before And After

div.a: Your Clothes Are Making Indian Cotton Farmers Commit Suicide

div.div: "Dirty White Gold" is a film aiming to expose the tragedy of unrestricted globalized fashion. The film begins by examining the hundreds of thousands of Indian cotton farmers who, saddled by economic hopelessness, have taken their own lives.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ziaef3&via=Digg&text=Your Clothes Are Making Indian Cotton Farmers Commit Suicide

div.a: Cypherpunk Rising

div.div: "Privacy is quite dead. That people still worship at its corpse doesn't change that."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XV4FTl&via=Digg&text=Cypherpunk Rising

div.a: Bush’s Art Teacher Says He Has Real Potential As Artist

div.div: Atlanta’s Fox 5 talked to Bonnie Flood, a Georgia art instructor who spent about a month teaching the 43rd president how to paint, saying she worked with him for around six hours a day.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14Gk4XF&via=Digg&text=Bush’s Art Teacher Says He Has Real Potential As Artist

div.a: An Oral History Of The Chicago Bulls' Obese All-Male Dance Squad

div.div: It was just another game. Then, at one timeout, something different happened. The whistle blew, and a group of flamboyantly dressed overweight men ran out to the middle of the court. The music started and the men started their routine: Rubbing their ample bellies. Pulling up their shirts. Gyrating. Dancing (kind of). Sweating.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xv1NNx&via=Digg&text=An Oral History Of The Chicago Bulls' Obese All-Male Dance Squad

div.div: STORE THESE IN THE TOP DRAWER

div.a: 14 Infographics To Help Organize Your Kitchen

div.div: These 14 infographics have one main purpose, above all: to help you find the right tools for your kitchen and enable you to cook in it the culinary feats you’ve always imagined yourself preparing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10cVahB&via=Digg&text=14 Infographics To Help Organize Your Kitchen
